message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to own our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for you at $12,000, which aligns perfectly with its worth. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is a fantastic chance to secure this product at a discount, ensuring you benefit from its high-quality features and long-term value. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
